name: VR Speedrunning
desc:
VR Speedrunning is a central hub to view the leaderboards for the top VR speedgames.

Along with the website, there is a [Twitter bot](https://twitter.com/VRSpeedruns) that posts new world records, and a Discord bot for the [VR Speedrunning Discord server](https://discord.gg/7PKWZuW).

name: VR Laser Game
desc: VR Laser Game is a work in progress puzzle game in VR using [Unity](https://unity.com/) that i've been iterating on for a few years.

name: BigftioBot
desc: BigftioBot is a [Twitch](https://twitch.tv/) chat bot. Features include custom commands, quotes, moderation tools, and more.

name: URBot
desc:
URBot is a verified [Discord](https://discord.com/) bot made for the roleplaying web show [URealms](https://urealms.com/).

I stopped maintaining this bot in October 2019, however for now the bot is still active and can be added to new servers.

name: TalosVR SR
desc: Talos VR Speedrunning Resource is a site that hosts useful strats and tricks for [The Talos Principle VR](https://store.steampowered.com/app/552440/The_Talos_Principle_VR/) speedruns.

name: BBot V2
desc:
BBot V2 is an open source rewrite of my general purpose [Discord](https://discord.com/) bot.

It can't be added to public servers, however the source is available on Github.

name: FCDisplay
desc:
FCDisplay was a mod for [Beat Saber](https://beatsaber.com/) that added a visual element to the game when the user hasn't missed a note.

I stopped maintaining the mod when an official version of this feature was added to the game.

name: ImmersiveMode
desc:
ImmersiveMode was a mod for [Beat Saber](https://beatsaber.com/) that disabled all UI while in a song, either just in-headset, just in the mirror, or both.

I stopped maintaining the mod when an official version of this feature was added to the game.

name: StreamInfo
desc:
StreamInfo was a mod for [Beat Saber](https://beatsaber.com/) that allowed players to display game info as an overlay on their streams or videos.

I stopped maintaining the mod when an official version of this feature was added to the game.

name: BBot
desc: BBot is my first real attempt at making a [Discord](https://discord.com/) bot.
